oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A long term epidemiological study of bovine viral diarrhoea infections in a large herd of dairy cattle
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Moerman, A.
Straver, P. J.
de Jong, M. C. M.
Quak, J.
Baanvinger, Th.
Van Oirschot, J. T.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: bovine viral diarrhoea virus
BVDV
Epidemiology
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Epidemiological aspects of bovine viral diarrhoea virus (BVDV) infections were studied longitudinally in a large dairy herd for three years. Full article published in Veterinary Record (1993) 132, 622-626
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1993; 100
